Jose Chaparro

Front End Developer

About

I'm a 26 year old Front End Web Developer living in Gilbert, AZ
In August of 2018 I wanted to begin working on creating a great career for myself. Coding was something I had seen online through Instagram and I was immediatly pulled towards it.

In September of 2018 I joined a Web Development Bootcamp at the University of Arizona. It was tough completing the homework assignments but in April of 2019, I completed the camp.
Throughout 2019 I juggled a promotion at work and my learning in Web Development however, one did take priority over the other.

2020 came and impacted a lot of people in different ways. Being that I was told to begin working from home, I quickly realized that I was gaining an extra 2 hours of my day due to no longer having to sit in traffice. I jumped back into Web Development by watching several series on Youtube as well as completing several Udemy courses such as Modern HTML & CSS From The Beginning (Including SASS) and Build Responsive Real World Websites with HTML5 and CSS3.

At this time, I am currently working on improving my frontend skills day by day in between working 2 jobs. It is tiring at times but I am constantly pushing myself out of my comfort zone to further my learning.
